daksha ranawiruwan wana densil kobbakaduwa, wijaya wimalarathna athulu ranawiruwan eda 1987 warshayedi wadamarachchi meheyumen koti nayaka welupille prabhakaran awasan warga kilomitarayata kotukala awasthawedi indiyanu guwan hamudawe guwan yana balahathkarayen shri lankawe guwan simawa aakramanaya karamin udin parippu damu bawath, ese indiyanu rajaya dadi balapamak kota wadamarachchi meheyuma atharamanga nathara kota koti sanwidhanaye nayaka welupille prabhakaran bera ganimata kriya kala bawath unwahanse prakasha karathi. 2009 wasare mayi masa mul sathiyedi pranshaye saha engalanthaye widesha amathyawarun shri lankawata pamina uthure manushiya meheyuma nathara karana lesata dadi balapamak sidu kalada ewakata janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha ema kisidu wideshiya balapamakata yatath nowi thrasthawadaya mulumaninma parajaya karana thuru manushiya meheyuma kriyathmaka kirimata deshapalana nayakathwaya laba dun bawath madagoda abhayathissa himiyo sihipath karathi.
